original_text: Instead, always think about the things that are important in the kingdom of God. Then God will also give you the things that you need each day.
korean_text: 다만 너희는 그의 나라를 구하라 그리하면 이런 것들을 너희에게 더하시리라

sentences.original_text: Instead, always think about the things
that are important in the kingdom of God.
Then God will also give you
the things that you need each day.
